1.content:

Glenn looked up, wiped his eyes and turned to see the skunk sitting next to him. "You're the first person ever to talk to me without screaming and running off. Anyway, I've recently been to banished here from my home and sent here to live forever but after having people run at the sight of me, I decided to rest here, but some scientists trapped me in this forcefield that i can't get through, but it seems you can."

The skunk sat there surprised at what she heard "So how did you get banished to here then?" she asked.

"Well I could tell you but do you think we could talk somewhere more private?" Glenn asks the skunk and the skunk seems confused at what he said. "Er didn't you say that you can't get through the forcefield?"

"Well if I possess an item or a person, I can pass through the forcefield with no problem, so is it ok if I possess you to go somewhere more private?" Glenn asks the skunk.

11112.content:
After an uneventful trip, they finally reach the sports center. Glen can’t wait to finally be able to relax and experience swimming.

Sarah went inside a cubicle at the changing room after making sure that no one is around. She placed the towel on a bench and gave Glen the ok to come out. Glen dispossessed the towel and hovered in front of Sarah. He can sense that she is a little nervous, so he asked “are you nervous?”. “A bit, I trust you with my body, but I am nervous that you might run into some trouble with someone... or embarrass me in front of someone I know!” Replied Sarah. “Don’t worry!” Glen assured her “In any case if I run into trouble I have access to your memories and try to mimic your interactions”. “All right, My body is ready” said Sarah, opening her arms out while slightly giggling. Glen flies into her body and takes control.

Glen, now his best friend Sarah, takes a deep breath filling out her lungs and patting around getting used to his new body. “Man these breasts still feel weird” he thought. He exits the changing area and heads to the pool. Glen enters the pool, searching through Sarah’s memories on how to swim, when he figures it out, he starts swimming back and forth. He did a couple of rounds then decided to go and relax under the sun, clearing his mind after all he went through. He decided to look through his best friends thoughts and he confirmed that she really does trust him and she does also consider him a friend. “She is a very good person, and has a very comfortable body” he thought after lying down.

Sarah if she was a human (to our eyes):

https://www.123rf.com/photo_10356548_you...

A couple minutes later, he found it boring without Sarah to talk through, so he took a look around and found a young male tiger siting in the corner, making sure no one saw him, he exited Sarah’s body and flew into the teenage tiger (who is around the same age as Sarah).

Sarah wakes up rubbing her eyes, realizing that she is at the pool and that glen was supposed to be possessing her. She frantically starts looking around for you, fearing that Glen has been captured by scientists. Then Glen, in his new body -flexing his new muscles and getting used to his new form-, came over to Sarah and confirmed to her that he is Glen.

“It became boring without anyone to talk to so I decided to possess another body in order to be able to talk to you”

“Are you sure you can possess someone else without being capture?”

“Yes don’t worry Sarah, I’ve got it under control! So how are you feeling? Dizzy?”

“No I’m fine, how was my body?”

“It felt great, more comfortable than my current host’s body. Although it felt weird around the chest area....” Glen says that last part in a low voice. “But the most comfortable form ever is of course my own spirit form” he said.

They both go down to the pool to swim and play in the water together. After that Glen goes to the bar and brings some drinks for him and Sarah. They spent the evening talking to each other, explaining life in this mysterious land, and comparing it to Glen’s home world, in addition to telling each other about funny things that happened in their lives.

“It’s getting late, I think you should return your host his body” Sarah says “Would you like to possess my body or my bikini?” She asks. Glen decides to take over Sarah since it is much more comfortable than taking over a bikini. Glen explains to Sarah that they should both go to a corner and lay down, then he would exit his host, leaving him unconscious for a few minutes for him to take over Sarah and leave. Sarah agrees, they do it and Glen becomes Sarah.

Glen goes to the locker rooms, where he changes and takes Sarah’s stuff, then heads home. Once he arrived, he felt a strange feeling in his lower half of his body, which Sarah’s memory tells him that it is called a pee, and you get rid of it in the bathroom. Glen goes to the bathroom and does his business. The decided to give Sarah a bath (because her memories say that she does this every day and when she goes to the pool, she does that straight after she arrives home). He gives her a bath, exploring a human body even more along the way. And then makes her wear warm and cozy pajamas. After all that...

info.brief_description: When a outcast possessive spirit makes friends with a female anthro skunk,  things happen.
info.description:
There are 2 types of spirit in the world, shadonians and lighterions. Shadonians are merciless and only care for themselves, lighterions are caring and helpful to whatever creature they encounter.

A shadonian and a lighterion got married and had a child called Glenn, but Glenn was banished from the shadonian land for being too caring.

Glenn then appears in a land of anthros where he makes fast friends with a female anthro skunk, Sarah Silverwind. Oh and the anthros can see and hear Glenn at all times.

What happens is up to you!

Just use proper grammer and NO male gay stuff and we'll be ok

I may also give GP for what i think are decent entries.
